title: Ecuador
subtitle: Trek the spectacular avenue of volcanoes
short_description: Embark on a trekking adventure through some of South America's most iconic terrain. Trek Cotopaxi Volcano. Swim in Quilotoa's Crater Lake. Hike the glaciers of Chimborazo. Encounter amazing waterfalls and soak in natural hot springs around Ba√±os. Take a salsa dance lesson and barter for local crafts at the Saquisili native market.
